full_translation:
**Register of the Three Masters’ Names, Styles, Appearances, Abodes, and Locations**

Compiled by Wanfu. One fascicle.
*Source text:* *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, *Dongxuan Section*, *Registers and Records Category*.

**The Text on the Three Masters’ Names, Styles, Appearances, Abodes, and Locations of the Dongxuan Lingbao Tradition**

Wanfu states: The scriptures say, *"Without a master, one cannot be delivered."* They also say, *"First visualize the Three Masters, then practice the Dao."* In all matters—whether reciting scriptures, lecturing, chanting, performing rituals, burning incense, entering chambers, or ascending altars—one must first pay homage to the master and visualize them, then make vows to deliver both one’s nine generations of ancestors and oneself. Without adhering to this method, the true numinous beings will not descend. To pay homage to the master, one must know their location; to visualize them, one must clearly recognize their appearance. At the time of receiving the Dao, the master should instruct accordingly. Thus, from the *Zhengyi* tradition upward to the *Dongzhen*, the names, styles, appearances, abodes, and locations of the Three Masters for each ordination are recorded as follows.

---

**1. Zhengyi Master**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so] of [such-and-such] state, in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a male/female official of [such-and-such] rank, aged [so-many] years, from [such-and-such] village in [such-and-such] county of [such-and-such] prefecture, received the *Zhengyi Mengwei* Register at the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master (Dushi):** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village; a male/female official practicing qi-regulation, named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master (Jishi):** [Same format as above.]
- **Scripture Master (Jingshi):** [Same format as above.]

**Guarantor and Preceptor:** Guaranteed by [so-and-so], a male/female official practicing qi-regulation.

[The following five persons follow the same format as above.]

---

**2. Master of the Five Thousand Characters**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so] of [such-and-such] state, in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a male/female disciple, aged [so-many] years, styled [so-and-so], from [such-and-such] village in [such-and-such] county of [such-and-such] prefecture, received the *Daode Wuqian Wen* and the *Three Grades of Essential Precepts* at the oratory, mountain retreat, or dwelling in [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master:** From [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village; a male/female Daoist master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, styled [so-and-so].
- **Register Master:** [Same format as above.]
- **Scripture Master:** From [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village; a male/female Daoist master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, styled [so-and-so].

---

**Ranks of Ordination Officials:**
1. **Three Masters (Three Persons):** Called *Fashi* (Dharma Masters).
2. **Five Guarantors (Five Persons):** Called *Dujang* (Chief Lecturers).
3. **Six Illuminators (Six Persons):** Called *Jianji* (Supervisors of Salvation).
4. **Seven Witnesses (Seven Persons):** Called *Shijing* (Scripture Attendants).
5. **Eight Initiators (Eight Persons):** Called *Shixiang* (Incense Attendants).
6. **Nine Perfected (Nine Persons):** Called *Shideng* (Lamp Attendants).

The above six ranks, totaling thirty-eight persons, consist of the master’s fellow students, those of high virtue, close associates, or spiritually advanced disciples and outstanding talents. They jointly sign the document, mutually encouraging one another, and are revered as teachers, styled *Zunren* (Venerable Ones). They present the ritual towel and knife to symbolize wiping away dust and filth, severing entanglements, unraveling the net of afflictions, and breaking through the web of obstacles. The meaning lies in liberation, attaining carefree purity and clarity. Those of shallow understanding and limited learning should not presume to partake.

The names of these individuals are recorded below the names of the Three Masters.

---

**3. Master of the Divine Incantations of the Abyssal Caverns**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a male/female disciple from [such-and-such] village in [such-and-such] county, aged [so-many] years, now at [such-and-such] location, received the *Dongyuan Divine Mantra Registers, Scriptures, and Precepts*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master:** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture; a *Dong* Dharma Master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

---

**4. Master of the Cavern Spirits**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Dongshen* tradition from the oratory of [such-and-such] county, now at [such-and-such] location, received the *Dongshen Scriptures and Precepts*, the *Registers and Contracts of Taboo Names*, and the *Great Characters of the Three Sovereigns*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master:** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture; a *Dong* Dharma Master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

The names and styles of the Three Masters serving as *Lin Tan Zheng Ming* (Altar Witnesses) follow the above format.

---

**5. Master of Ascending the Mystery**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Shengxuan* tradition from the oratory of [such-and-such] county, now at [such-and-such] location, received the *Great Contract of the Seventy-Two Characters of Shengxuan*, the *One Hundred Twenty-Nine Precepts of the Great One*, along with the scriptures and contracts.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master, Register Master, and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

---

**6. Master of the Cavern Mystery**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Dongxuan* tradition, aged [so-many] years, at the numinous mountain retreat or oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, received the *Natural Contracts of Lingbao*, the *Upper Grade Precepts of Closing the Six Passions*, the *Middle Alliance Scriptures and Upper Grade Precepts of Wisdom*, the *Great Alliance of the Three Primes and One Hundred Eighty Precepts*, and the *Two Registers of the True Writ*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master, Register Master, and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

The names and styles of the Three Masters serving as *Lin Tan Zheng Ming* follow the above format.

---

**7. Master of the Highest Clarity**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Three Radiant Ones of the Great Cavern* and a Perfected of [such-and-such] Peak of [such-and-such] Sacred Mountain, aged [so-many] years, now at a secluded valley or numinous peak in [such-and-such] location, received the *Seven Contracts and Four Pledges of Shangqing*, the *Great Precepts of Observing the Body*, the *Precious Scriptures and Talismans*, and the *Divine Writ of the Most High*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Scripture Master:** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county; a *Dadong* Dharma Master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master and Initiation Master:** [Same format as above.]

The names and styles of the Three *Dong* Dharma Masters serving as *Lin Tan Zheng Ming*: [so-and-so], a Perfected of [such-and-such] Peak of [such-and-such] Sacred Mountain, aged [so-many] years. The other two follow the same format.

---

The above is written in black ink on yellow silk. The master burns incense and bestows it [upon the disciple].

The disciple, upon receiving each master’s name, bows three times in succession. If the master possesses a genealogy, it shall also be copied and transmitted separately as prescribed in the scriptures. Once the disciple has memorized and refined [the teachings], they shall seal them together with the dharma.

The Six Illuminations, Five Safeguards, and Three Witnesses, though not within the bounds of constant contemplation, are the causes of my accomplishment—thus they should also be borne in mind as steps toward entering perfection. Hence they are recorded here.

Here ends the text on the names, styles, appearances, and abodes of the Three Masters of the Dongxuan Lingbao tradition.

chunks.original_text: 宝三师名讳形状居观方所文。 原题账万福编录。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞玄部谱录类。 洞玄灵宝三师名讳形状居观方所文 万福曰：经云，非师不度，非师不又云，先存三师，然后行道。 凡厥读经讲诵，行道烧香，入室登坛，皆先礼师存念，次当起愿开度九祖及以己身。 此法不遵，真灵靡降。 礼师则须知方所，存念则审识形容。 受道之辰，师当指授，故自正一以上，至乎洞真，参受三师名讳形状、住观方所，并具仪于左云尔。 正－师讳 国号某年太岁某某月、某朔某日、某州县乡里，男女官某甲、年若干某，於某州郡乡里观宇，受正一盟威某箓。 三师姓讳如左： 度师，某州郡乡里观，男女官治炁，姓名，年若干岁，形状。 籍师，某州郡乡里观，男女官治炁，姓名，年若干岁，形状。 经师，某州郡乡里观，男女官治炁，姓名，年若干岁，形状。 保举法师，某治炁男女官某甲保举。 五人例前 五千文师讳 某国某号、某年太岁某某月、某朔某日、某州郡县乡里，男女弟子姓名，年若干，字某，於某州郡县、某山观宅舍，受道德五千文、三品要戒。 三师姓讳如左： 度师，某州郡县乡里，男女官道士先生，姓某，讳某，年如干岁，字某。 籍师，某州郡县乡里，男女官道士先生，姓某，讳某，年如干岁，字某。 经师，某州郡县乡里，男女官道士一先生，姓某，讳某，年如干岁，字某。 一、三师三人。 谓之法师 二、五保五人。 谓之都讲 三、六明六人。 谓之监济 四、七证七人。 谓之侍经 五、八度八人。 谓之侍香 六、九成九人。 谓之侍灯 右六品三十八人，皆是师之同学、高德、亲知，或神足弟子、俊彦英才，同为署辞，更相奖劝，敬之如师，号曰尊人。 奉献巾刀，以期拂拭尘垢，断割缠缚，解释烦恼之罗，破除障滞之网，义存解脱，逍遥净明，浅识末学勿叨。 此次单记名於三师讳下。 神祝师讳 国号年岁月日，某州县乡里，男女某甲，年若干，今於某郡县，受洞渊神咒契箓经戒。 三师名讳如左： 度师，某州观，某洞法师，姓讳，年岁，形状。 籍师、经师例。 洞神师讳 国号年岁月日，州县观，洞神弟子某甲，今於某所，受洞神经戒、讳箓券契、三皇大字。 三师名讳如左： 度师，某州观，某洞法师，姓讳，年岁，形状。 下二师例 临坛证明三师名讳，其如上例。 升玄师讳 国号年岁月日，州县观，升玄弟子某甲，今於某处，受升玄七十二字大券、太一· 百二十九戒，兼经契。 三师名讳如左： 度师、籍师、经师例前。 洞玄师讳 国号年岁月日，州县观，洞玄弟子某甲，年若干，於某州县灵山靖室，受灵宝自然契券、闭塞六情上品戒、中盟经智慧上品大戒、大盟三元百八十戒、真文二箓。 三师名讳如左： 度、籍、经三师，具如前例。 临坛证明三师名讳，具如上例。 上清师讳 国号年岁月日，大洞三景弟子、某岳某帝真人某甲，，年若干岁，今於某所灵峰幽谷，奉受上清七券四契、观身大戒、宝经符箓、太上神文。 三师名讳如左： 经师，某州县观，大洞法师，姓某，讳某，年若干岁，形状。 籍、度师例。 临坛证明三洞法师，某岳某帝真人某甲，年若干岁。 下二例。 右墨书黄素，师焚香授之。
chunks.translated_text:
**Register of the Three Masters’ Names, Styles, Appearances, Abodes, and Locations**

Compiled by Wanfu. One fascicle.
*Source text:* *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, *Dongxuan Section*, *Registers and Records Category*.

**The Text on the Three Masters’ Names, Styles, Appearances, Abodes, and Locations of the Dongxuan Lingbao Tradition**

Wanfu states: The scriptures say, *"Without a master, one cannot be delivered."* They also say, *"First visualize the Three Masters, then practice the Dao."* In all matters—whether reciting scriptures, lecturing, chanting, performing rituals, burning incense, entering chambers, or ascending altars—one must first pay homage to the master and visualize them, then make vows to deliver both one’s nine generations of ancestors and oneself. Without adhering to this method, the true numinous beings will not descend. To pay homage to the master, one must know their location; to visualize them, one must clearly recognize their appearance. At the time of receiving the Dao, the master should instruct accordingly. Thus, from the *Zhengyi* tradition upward to the *Dongzhen*, the names, styles, appearances, abodes, and locations of the Three Masters for each ordination are recorded as follows.

---

**1. Zhengyi Master**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so] of [such-and-such] state, in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a male/female official of [such-and-such] rank, aged [so-many] years, from [such-and-such] village in [such-and-such] county of [such-and-such] prefecture, received the *Zhengyi Mengwei* Register at the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master (Dushi):** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village; a male/female official practicing qi-regulation, named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master (Jishi):** [Same format as above.]
- **Scripture Master (Jingshi):** [Same format as above.]

**Guarantor and Preceptor:** Guaranteed by [so-and-so], a male/female official practicing qi-regulation.

[The following five persons follow the same format as above.]

---

**2. Master of the Five Thousand Characters**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so] of [such-and-such] state, in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a male/female disciple, aged [so-many] years, styled [so-and-so], from [such-and-such] village in [such-and-such] county of [such-and-such] prefecture, received the *Daode Wuqian Wen* and the *Three Grades of Essential Precepts* at the oratory, mountain retreat, or dwelling in [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master:** From [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village; a male/female Daoist master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, styled [so-and-so].
- **Register Master:** [Same format as above.]
- **Scripture Master:** From [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, [such-and-such] village; a male/female Daoist master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, styled [so-and-so].

---

**Ranks of Ordination Officials:**
1. **Three Masters (Three Persons):** Called *Fashi* (Dharma Masters).
2. **Five Guarantors (Five Persons):** Called *Dujang* (Chief Lecturers).
3. **Six Illuminators (Six Persons):** Called *Jianji* (Supervisors of Salvation).
4. **Seven Witnesses (Seven Persons):** Called *Shijing* (Scripture Attendants).
5. **Eight Initiators (Eight Persons):** Called *Shixiang* (Incense Attendants).
6. **Nine Perfected (Nine Persons):** Called *Shideng* (Lamp Attendants).

The above six ranks, totaling thirty-eight persons, consist of the master’s fellow students, those of high virtue, close associates, or spiritually advanced disciples and outstanding talents. They jointly sign the document, mutually encouraging one another, and are revered as teachers, styled *Zunren* (Venerable Ones). They present the ritual towel and knife to symbolize wiping away dust and filth, severing entanglements, unraveling the net of afflictions, and breaking through the web of obstacles. The meaning lies in liberation, attaining carefree purity and clarity. Those of shallow understanding and limited learning should not presume to partake.

The names of these individuals are recorded below the names of the Three Masters.

---

**3. Master of the Divine Incantations of the Abyssal Caverns**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a male/female disciple from [such-and-such] village in [such-and-such] county, aged [so-many] years, now at [such-and-such] location, received the *Dongyuan Divine Mantra Registers, Scriptures, and Precepts*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master:** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture; a *Dong* Dharma Master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

---

**4. Master of the Cavern Spirits**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Dongshen* tradition from the oratory of [such-and-such] county, now at [such-and-such] location, received the *Dongshen Scriptures and Precepts*, the *Registers and Contracts of Taboo Names*, and the *Great Characters of the Three Sovereigns*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master:** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture; a *Dong* Dharma Master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

The names and styles of the Three Masters serving as *Lin Tan Zheng Ming* (Altar Witnesses) follow the above format.

---

**5. Master of Ascending the Mystery**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Shengxuan* tradition from the oratory of [such-and-such] county, now at [such-and-such] location, received the *Great Contract of the Seventy-Two Characters of Shengxuan*, the *One Hundred Twenty-Nine Precepts of the Great One*, along with the scriptures and contracts.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master, Register Master, and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

---

**6. Master of the Cavern Mystery**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Dongxuan* tradition, aged [so-many] years, at the numinous mountain retreat or oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county, received the *Natural Contracts of Lingbao*, the *Upper Grade Precepts of Closing the Six Passions*, the *Middle Alliance Scriptures and Upper Grade Precepts of Wisdom*, the *Great Alliance of the Three Primes and One Hundred Eighty Precepts*, and the *Two Registers of the True Writ*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Initiation Master, Register Master, and Scripture Master:** [Same format as above.]

The names and styles of the Three Masters serving as *Lin Tan Zheng Ming* follow the above format.

---

**7. Master of the Highest Clarity**
[The disciple’s] name and style: In the reign of [so-and-so], in the year of [Tai Sui’s] [such-and-such] cyclical sign, on the [such-and-such] day of the [such-and-such] month, [so-and-so], a disciple of the *Three Radiant Ones of the Great Cavern* and a Perfected of [such-and-such] Peak of [such-and-such] Sacred Mountain, aged [so-many] years, now at a secluded valley or numinous peak in [such-and-such] location, received the *Seven Contracts and Four Pledges of Shangqing*, the *Great Precepts of Observing the Body*, the *Precious Scriptures and Talismans*, and the *Divine Writ of the Most High*.

The names and styles of the Three Masters are as follows:
- **Scripture Master:** From the oratory of [such-and-such] prefecture, [such-and-such] county; a *Dadong* Dharma Master, surnamed [so-and-so], named [so-and-so], aged [so-many] years, with [such-and-such] appearance.
- **Register Master and Initiation Master:** [Same format as above.]

The names and styles of the Three *Dong* Dharma Masters serving as *Lin Tan Zheng Ming*: [so-and-so], a Perfected of [such-and-such] Peak of [such-and-such] Sacred Mountain, aged [so-many] years. The other two follow the same format.

---

The above is written in black ink on yellow silk. The master burns incense and bestows it [upon the disciple].

metadata.source_file: dao\正统道藏洞玄部\谱箓类\洞玄灵宝三师名讳形状居观方所文.txt

chunks.original_text: 弟子每受一师讳，三再礼。 若师有谱，兼别如经写授之。 谙炼已，与法同缄。 其六明、五保、三证，虽非存念之限，是我成就之因，亦宜存忆，为入真之阶，故编记耳。 洞玄灵宝三师名讳形状居观方所文竟
chunks.translated_text:
The disciple, upon receiving each master’s name, bows three times in succession. If the master possesses a genealogy, it shall also be copied and transmitted separately as prescribed in the scriptures. Once the disciple has memorized and refined [the teachings], they shall seal them together with the dharma.

The Six Illuminations, Five Safeguards, and Three Witnesses, though not within the bounds of constant contemplation, are the causes of my accomplishment—thus they should also be borne in mind as steps toward entering perfection. Hence they are recorded here.

Here ends the text on the names, styles, appearances, and abodes of the Three Masters of the Dongxuan Lingbao tradition.

- **Register Master and Initiation Master:** [Same format as above.]

The names and styles of the Three *Dong* Dharma Masters serving as *Lin Tan Zheng Ming*: [so-and-so], a Perfected of [such-and-such] Peak of [such-and-such] Sacred Mountain, aged [so-many] years. The other two follow the same format.

The above is written in black ink on yellow silk. The master burns incense and bestows it [upon the disciple].
